<a id="VisualShaderNodeTransformFunc"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeTransformFunc

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Computes a [Transform3D](Transform3D.md) function within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Computes an inverse or transpose function on the provided [Transform3D](Transform3D.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
